Richard Thorpe https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Richard_Thorpe 0 Richard Thorpe (born Rollo Smolt Thorpe; February 24, 1896 – May 1, 1991) was an American film director best known for his long career at Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. Richard_Thorpe ( born Rollo_Smolt_Thorpe ; February_24_,_1896 – May_1_,_1991 ) was an_American_film_director best known for his_long_career at Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer .
